CustomField.formula: OR( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Created')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Being Amended')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Reviewed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Submitted for Review')) ), AND( $User.Id != OwnerId, OR(ISBLANK(ReviewerIds__c),NOT(CONTAINS(ReviewerIds__c, $User.Id))) ) )
CustomField.label: X_HideEditButton for Reviewers
